install.name: jpfchat15online
install.author: Vizimetrics, Inc
install.description:
CHECK FOR MOST CURRENT VERSION



jPFChat is a joomla 1.0.x CHAT component (based on utChat) using phpfreechat 1.1 phpfreechat.net
This module provides a front-end display of users currently chatting.

Written by: Tim Milo - tim@jPFChat.com - jPFChat.com


CREDITS
utChat: Yann Sallou syan@joomlagora.org
phpFreeChat: Stephane Gully contact@phpfreechat.net - phpfreechat.net

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module CSS Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the module (table.moduletable). This allows individual module styling.

param.name: channel
param.label: Channel
param.description: Restrict output to users on the specified channel (NULL for the whole server)

param.name: timeout
param.label: TimeOut
param.description: Time to wait before a nickname is considered offline

param.name: display_what
param.label: What to Show
param.description: Should the module display the NUMBER of users online, or the NAMES of users online?
